thread.title: 20 Times Women In Suits Completely Owned Red Carpet
thread.title_full: 20 Times Women In Suits Completely Owned The Red Carpet

author: Sarah Karlan
title: 20 Times Women In Suits Completely Owned Red Carpet
text:
10292730 But everyone swooned even harder when she explained her inspiration for suiting up that evening: Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @evanrachelwood
ID: 10292842 That same evening, Kathryn Hahn and Octavia Spencer also appeared in downright amazing suits. Frazer Harrison / Getty Images
 Yes and double yes.
ID: 10293584 *flips open photo album* Let’s take a moment to recall the other amazing women who have walked red carpets, floated over stages, and sat upon late-night talk show couches in their best suits. View this image ›
E! / Via The Golden Globes ID: 10293331 1. Comedians and power couple Cameron Esposito and Rhea Butcher could serve as mayors of Dapper Town, USA, if it existed: View this image ›
Rich Polk / Getty Images ID: 10293666 2. Think of a suit, any suit — Janelle Monáe has worn it on a red carpet: View this image ›
Nicholas Hunt / Getty Images ID: 10293683 Seriously. Getty Images
Getty Images
 ID: 10293801 3. Carrie Brownstein isn’t one to shy away from a classic look: 10293669 4. Tatum O’Neal must take the cake for being one of the youngest dapper ladies to walk the red carpet: View this image ›
Hulton Archive / Getty Images ID: 10294383 5. And feel free to contact Lena Waithe if you need help with your bow tie: View this image ›
Mark Davis / Getty Images ID: 10294404 6. Let us never forget this all polka-dot everything getup worn by Jill Soloway: View this image ›
GETTY ID: 10293700 7. You’d be hard-pressed to find Ellen DeGeneres in anything other than a jacket and button-down combo: Kevin Winter / Getty Images
 ID: 10293836 8. And Rihanna once went and reinvented all-white everything: View this image ›
Ethan Miller / Getty Images ID: 10293848 9. Amber Heard taught the world that you can’t go wrong in a tuxedo: Valerie Macon / AFP / Getty Images
 ID: 10294282 10. Though, nobody looks more striking in a suit than the legendary Tilda Swinton: Justin Tallis / AFP / Getty Images
 ID: 10293868 11. But Cate Blanchett manages to give her a run for her money: View this image ›
Gabriel Bouys 10293873 12. Maisie Williams may be young, but she rocks a tux like an old pro: View this image ›
Anthony Harvey / Getty Images ID: 10293903 13. Meanwhile, Solange is usually in a suit class all her own: ID: 10293914 14. Patti Smith would laugh if you called this a new trend: View this image ›
Giuseppe Cacace 10294003 15. And Lea DeLaria would join right in: Dave Kotinsky / Getty Images
 ID: 10294093 16. Kristen Stewart made this patterned top an instant classic: 10293920 17. And nobody knows how to make a better suit appearance than Ruby Rose: Valerie Macon / AFP / Getty Images
 ID: 10294234 18. But if you’re talking suits on red carpets, you can’t forget the tiniest Canadian Queen of Dapper: View this image ›
Ernesto Ruscio / Getty Images Thanks, Canada, for letting us borrow Ellen Page all the time.
ID: 10293925 Are you taking notes? Good. Carlos Alvarez / Getty Images
Getty
 ID: 10293943 19. Does this count as a suit? I’m not sure, but whatever Evan Rachel Wood did here was completely historic and should be placed lovingly in a museum: View this image ›
Mario Anzuoni / Reuters Historic.
ID: 10293126 20. And some women in suits need no introduction at all: Sonia Moskowitz / Getty Images
 ID: 10293958 To conclude: More women in suits, please. View this image ›
Twitter: @penguinsaurus ID: 10294060
